scripts.prep: mkdir -p build && cp index.html build && ln -s ../node_modules/material-symbols/ build/
scripts.start: mkdir -p build && cp index.html build && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --watch --outdir=build --servedir=build
scripts.sdl-test: npm run clean && mkdir -p build && esbuild src/*.ts --outdir=build && node build/sdltest.js
scripts.clogwench-test: npm run clean && mkdir -p build && esbuild src/*.ts --outdir=build && node build/clogwench.js
